channel.title: Jacking G's
channel.description: Has anybody ever been robbed by a "g". Im not talking about Poor guys, im talking about those RIch kids the ones who think there "g" and get there mommies and daddies to buy them lexuses. I have been jumped by them SEVERAL times. Once at a mall when i was 13, he wanted a cell phone i did not have, and the result was him hitting me in the mall, running away, me going outside, him coming back, hits me to the ground, stomps on me until some guys come and get him off. Anotehr time i was in school with a smoke i was going outside for it and this guy comes up to me OBVISOLY RICH had a nice ipod nice phone nice hat, comes up to me and says why did you steal my smoke. I had no idea what he was talking about, and he kept on saying that until all his Gunit buddies came, and i got the shit kicked out of me for something i didnt do. I guess it would of helped if i hadnt called them G units though:P

item.title: Jacking G's
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“Monster Hack, post:14, topic:155546”][quote author=Bobby link=topic=212306.msg1863629#msg1863629 date=1194087896]
umm no I live in a rich white suburb. sorry. The most “exciting” thing of the year was that the some kid got suspended for a day for selling knifes.
[/quote]
That’s basically the subject of this thread…

Never been fully jumped. People have tried to start it, never finished it.
They always seem to want something they obviously already have, them rich kids.
I’m glad we don’t really have chavs because ffs, those guys are way more annoying then someone who will actually jump you.

-Mh[/quote]
I was refering to that fact that the poster said he thought that were rich thugs( or seomthing like that) where he lived. and I was saying that where i live there isn’t really any “gansters” or gangs

Read full topic

item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Speaking of G’s, I love guido’s. And I love this guy’s haircut!

http://youtube.com/watch?v=4JMOh-cul6M

So many quotable lines from this… it’s spreading like crazy in my school.

“My boys, they’re all coming out, they all got the same haircut, THEY’RE getting some fucking pussy tonight.”
“Skanks.”
“I am going to grind on every piece of pussy through that door. I’m gonna fucking grind them till my fucking dick falls off.”
“Not now chief, I’m in the fucking zone.”
“Jagerbombs? I fucking shower in that shit.”

Big brawl, and they never annoyed us again.

item.title: Jacking G's
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Can you elaborate? G as in a gangster, or g as in a grand?

But anyway, me and 2 friends were out one night, going to pick up my brother(he’s 12, we need to walk past a school and it’s usually full of boozers/druggies), and my 2 friends are 15 and 16(I’m 15), and since it was like 10 at night, and no police are ever around, we all had booze, and like 4 druggies doped up tried to jump us for money/drugs/whatever, so one of my friends just smashed his bottle and threatened to bottle them, they kind of hesitated and went off. Like I said it was dark, no one saw each other’s faces…

About 3 days later, in the local news, “3 yobs attempt to mob 4 innocent people”.

Read full topic

so we gladly went up to them and said “PISS OFF CUNTS!” which wasn’t so smart…then we see these little children charging at us…it was a good fight, 7 on 20…we managed to get rid of a few until the fight was broken up, my friends and i were suspended for 3 days (WTF)

item.title: Jacking G's
item.dc:creator: @hog hog
item.description:
@hog wrote:

I live in a pretty bad area no lies, roaches the bug and the stub in my house - not exactly cream of the crop but It could always be alot worse. I know more black crack dealers that compton pumps out in the quarterly, I’m not gloryfying it because since I’m here I guess that makes me white Trash - What ever i know my own worth.
I find the best way to deal with Wanksta’s is that if you make them feel stupid enough when they do decide to hit they do it in anger and you can usually expect it. Real G’s are another story unfortunately the sad reality is yeah some of these punks do have guns and they are too ignorant to know when to use them. Just always remember keep cool and I would suggest taking a couple actions toward bettering yourself physically for god forbid it should come a really bad attack - it will help with both body and mind.
Some personal favourites
And honestly if your in a pinch pay close attention to head control and Bob Spours RTD, last link.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pbvzFXwHJnU
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WCRGK1NJfl4
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mGsXwj7sXeQ
